Comon Issues¶

I can’t accept the EULA, nothing happens with I click the “I Accept” checkbox¶

You need to view the EULA before you can accept. Click the “End User License Agreement” link to open the EULA in a new tab. Once you’ve opened the EULA, you can check the “I Accept” box and begin using the extension.

I’ve configured a domain to automatically redirect, but it’s not triggering the plugin¶

Make sure you’re using a wildcard if you want to match all subdomains.

Pattern Matches
*.intdomain.local
intdomain.local
app1.intdomain.local
app2.intdomain.local
intdomain.local
intdomain.local only
